channel.title: How can i make a wepon 1 hit kill? please help
channel.description: i am trying to get a wepons damage up but i cant :( so could you post how to do it please and ty

item.title: How can i make a wepon 1 hit kill? please help
item.dc:creator: @TheMyth TheMyth
item.description:
@TheMyth wrote:

[quote=“rockh4rd, post:2, topic:233911”]item.cfg
and find the item
change the numbers to the right[/quote]

you could do that, but that gives all players that come accross this accsess to the 1 hit kill, for a more secure 1 go to your client.java and search for this:

if (StrPotion == 1) { // Strength Potion

at the end of that code put this:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == [ADD YOUR WEAPON ID HERE] && playerRights >= [ADD WHAT RIGHTS YOU NEED FOR 1 HIT KILL]) { MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 500000); MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.0205); MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 500000); MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.0205); MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 500000); MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.0205); MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 500000); MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.0205); MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 500000); MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.0205); MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 500000); MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.0205); MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 500000); MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.0205); MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 500000); MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.0205); }

this will make it so that if you have the player rights that you set it to (or below) and you use the weapon you chose you will get 1 hit kills with them hope this helped

Edit:Sorry i forgot to mention this code is about 3% mine, all i did was mess around with the weapon ids and change the strength values, i dont know who i got it off but i just didnt want to be called a leecher :).

Read full topic

item.title: How can i make a wepon 1 hit kill? please help
item.dc:creator: @m3ag_own3d_u m3ag own3d u
item.description:
@m3ag_own3d_u wrote:

go into item.cfg
ctrl + f search the item
go across u see numbers the 1st few a prize the 2nd from last is item strength bonus change that to 999999
save + compile
tada ur down!
